alert.note: Alert for Nassau; Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 2:58AM EDT until August 13 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Suffolk County in southeastern New York... Southeastern Nassau County in southeastern New York... * Until 400 AM EDT. * At 257 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bayville to Westbury to near Long Beach, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Plainview and Massapequa around 300 AM EDT. Huntington Station and Huntington around 305 AM EDT. Commack and Deer Park around 310 AM EDT. Islip and Brentwood around 315 AM EDT. Ronkonkoma and Stony Brook around 320 AM EDT. Centereach and Port Jefferson around 325 AM EDT. Medford and Patchogue around 330 AM EDT. Middle Island and Rocky Point around 335 AM EDT. Shirley and Wading River around 340 AM EDT. Manorville and Center Moriches around 345 AM EDT. Westhampton around 350 AM EDT. Riverhead around 355 AM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
